localize.text: I remember you, A… You were a person with a warm smile.
A, why did you never go meet it even though you created it?
But A, surely you already know. Did you put in all that work for just a simple vending machine that dispenses soda at the press of a button?
At the very least, you should give it a name.
There is nothing I can do even if you put on an expression like that.
It’s an unspoken rule that the creator names their creation.
Don’t dump your job on someone else, you’re the designer.
Go ahead and tell the machine its name.
It will be waiting for you. It seemed lonely.
